name: Trunk Rotation With Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Stand facing the cable machine with the handle at chest height and the cables in front of you.

2. Hold the handle with both hands shoulder-width apart, but not directly under your shoulders.

3. Rotate your torso to the right, keeping your feet and hips facing forward, as you pull the handle towards your left hip.

4. Focus on keeping your core tight throughout this movement.

5. Slowly bring the handle back to the starting position.

6. Alternate sides with each repetition.
short_summary: Trunk Rotation With Cable targets the muscles in the midsection of your body, improving flexibility and strength.
